text: 1.8 Mat 28.19, Mak 16.15, Luk 24.47-48, Jon 15.27, Apo 2.32, 3.15, 5.32 Pen nɨgɨm. God Kawnan ne ak apɨl nɨbop kod mɨdaknɨŋ, kɨles ak dɨnɨgabɨm agak. Dɨl, nɨbi am Jelusalem binɨb okok, Judiya plopens binɨb okok, Samaliya plopens binɨb okok, binɨb man okok mɨdupsek, yad tɨtay gɨpin ak kɨlop agñɨnɨgabɨm agak.
